name: Cursed by Hindsight
description:
Tips and hints at the bottom of the page!

When a devil wakes up in Paradise, they have only one goal...

GET OUT

Solve the arcane storage room puzzles of the Paradise!

Dip, duck, dive, and dodge the grasp of the angelic enforcers!

Destroy their holy seekers!

Kill GOD!

In Cursed by Hindsight, you play as the bearer of the cursed scarf, Ragnok, a devil far from home. Fortunately, your demonic consultant, Luci, has your back! Between the three of you, you're sure you can get back home! But the angels of paradise will make sure it takes all your best efforts, boons, and curses, to break free of their holy grasp! Can YOU escape Paradise in...

Cursed by Hindsight

Tips and Hints!

If you're having trouble beating the boss, try falling off the stage a couple times! You might be able to get behind it!

In the boss level, deactivate the shield towers by pushing the boxes in the middle to light up all the green lines!

Feeling overwhelmed by enemies? Try experimenting with the boxes and towers far to the left and right!
